title: Get vaccinated | Services
description: Getting the right vaccines (shots) helps protect you, your family, and your community from getting sick.
cleaned_text: Getting the right vaccines (shots) helps protect you, your family, and your community from getting sick. [](https://www.phila.gov/services/mental-physical-health/get-vaccinated/get-your-covid-19-vaccine/) Get your COVID-19 vaccineCOVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective for everyone 6 months old and up. [](https://www.phila.gov/services/mental-physical-health/get-vaccinated/get-your-mpox-vaccine/) Get your mpox vaccineMpox vaccines are safe and effective. Being vaccinated is one of the best ways to protect yourself and your partner and community. [](https://www.phila.gov/services/mental-physical-health/get-vaccinated/vaccinate-your-child/) Vaccinate your childProtect your children from these diseases by making sure that they are up-to-date on their vaccinations (shots). [](https://www.phila.gov/services/mental-physical-health/get-vaccinated/get-adult-vaccines/) Get adult vaccinesGetting vaccinated is the best way to protect yourself and your loved ones. Get the shots you need, even if you don't have health insurance.
